name: scheduler
description: Schedule, list, and manage recurring or one-off tasks using cron-like expressions. Tasks are stored in-memory and executed via setTimeout intervals.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: scheduler
toolDefinition.description: Create, list, or delete scheduled tasks. Tasks use cron-like expressions to define when they run and execute shell commands or log messages.

action.description: The scheduling operation: create (schedule a new task), list (show all tasks), delete (remove a task)

taskName.description: Unique name for the task (required for create and delete)

cronExpression.description: Cron-like expression defining the schedule. Supports: '*/N seconds' (every N seconds), '*/N minutes' (every N minutes), '*/N hours' (every N hours), 'once DELAY_SECONDS' (one-time after delay). Required for create action.

command.description: The command or message to execute when the task fires. Required for create action.
